params.prompt: The video opens with a woman seated at a wooden table against a plain dark green background. She is dressed in a white T-shirt featuring a graphic of a dog and the text "WIENER TAKES ALL." Her hair is styled casually, swept to the side, partially covering her left ear, where she wears a small earring. A smartphone is positioned on a stand in front of her, suggesting she is recording or livestreaming. Throughout the sequence, she actively gestures with her hands, speaking or explaining something, her movements dynamic and occasionally breaking into a smile, conveying an engaging and positive demeanor. The camera focuses on her, capturing her interactions with the smartphone, while the atmosphere remains light and cheerful.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
